content.rendered:
Transez has well qualified, experienced and dedicated engineers as well as a sound support staff and with this, we offer you modern innovative concepts.  From design specification to HVAC systems, you can always rely on Transez! Our Mechanical & Electrical services have a proven track record and an excellent reputation, which has been built up over years and across many market sectors. We are confident that we can provide our clients with innovative and sustainable solutions covering all aspects including the design, the coordination, the installation and the commissioning of the projects Mechanical & Electrical requirements. Both our mechanical and electrical departments work closely together to ensure we provide a coordinated installation that all associated with the project can be proud of.
 
 All our clients have seen the benefits of our high workforce retention rate over the years. It has led to an experienced and knowledgeable team in every aspect of the coordination of multi service installations. The engineers have worked closely together and have developed skills, which enable services to be installed with the least disruption to the client and the project, allowing ease of coordination with the building fabric and other trades.We believe the Transez Engineering team will bring innovation, experience, commitment, quality, flexibility and pride to any project we are involved in.
